dialogue.htmlContent:
#IF(pc.hasCompanions()) After telling [com.name] that [com.she] should return home, you ask Helena if she'd like to go out on a date with you this evening. #ELSE Knowing that Helena will be receptive to the idea, you ask her if she'd like to go out on a dinner date with you this evening. #ENDIF Flashing you a delightful smile, the beautiful harpy replies, #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_helenaDateFirstDateComplete)) [helena.speech(That sounds wonderful, [pc.name]. I am sure I need not remind you, but I only dine at 'The Golden Feather', so we shall be going there.)] #ELSE [helena.speech(That sounds wonderful, [pc.name]. I hope you haven't already made reservations anywhere, for I only dine at 'The Golden Feather' hotel, so we shall be going there.)] #ENDIF

From the firm tone of her voice, you can tell that Helena is unwilling to negotiate on this point, and so after accepting her choice of destination, you ask her when she'll be ready to leave. With a swish of her wings, she declares, [helena.speech(I am ready to depart immediately. First, you shall accompany me to my apartment so that I can get ready for our date, and then you shall take me to the restaurant.)]

As you prepare to leave, Helena turns to Scarlett and orders, [helena.speech(I cannot trust you to be left alone, so your work here is finished for the day. I might have need of you later, however, so you shall meet the two of us at my apartment, where I shall give you further instructions if necessary.)]

[scarlett.speech(Yes, Helena,)] Scarlett replies, before quickly exiting the store and flying off in the direction of the Harpy Nests.

After informing one of her harpy employees that they're in charge until closing time, Helena turns back to face you, before smiling and saying, [helena.speech(Please lead the way, [pc.name].)]

Escorting the beautiful matriarch out of her shop, you [pc.walk] by her side as the two of you travel through the streets of Dominion. Having told you that her apartment is located in the Harpy Nests, Helena happily engages you in idle conversation, which helps to make your somewhat lengthy journey pass in what seems like just a few moments. Before you know it, you find yourselves walking in the shadows cast by the Harpy Nest's huge, rooftop platforms, and as you arrive in the area beneath Helena's nest, the matriarch holds up one of her white-feathered wings to point at a huge building and declare, [helena.speech(That's 'The Golden Feather' hotel. We shall be dining in its restaurant this evening, but before that, I need to head up to my apartment and get changed.)]

Escorting the beautiful matriarch out of her shop, you [pc.walk] by her side as the two of you travel through the streets of Dominion. Helena happily engages you in idle conversation while you make your way towards her apartment in the Harpy Nests, which helps to make your somewhat lengthy journey pass in what seems like just a few moments. Before you know it, you once again find yourselves walking in the shadows cast by the Harpy Nest's huge, rooftop platforms, and as you arrive at 'The Golden Feather' hotel, Helena declares, [helena.speech(Let us head inside without delay; I wish to get changed as soon as possible.)]

Escorting the beautiful matriarch out of her shop, you suggest that the two of you should fly to her apartment so as to arrive there as quickly as possible. Liking the sound of your plan, Helena joins you in taking a short run down the street, before leaping into the air and flying up into the sky above Slaver Alley.

With the regal matriarch elegantly gliding along beside you, the two of you fly off in the direction of the Harpy Nests. Thanks to your ability to fly, it only takes a few minutes before you've arrived at your destination, and, letting Helena take the lead, you follow her as she swoops down and lands in the street beneath her nest. The reason for her choice of landing site is quickly revealed, for as you land beside her, the matriarch holds up one of her white-feathered wings to point at a huge building and declare, [helena.speech(That's 'The Golden Feather' hotel. We shall be dining in its restaurant this evening, but before that, I need to head up to my apartment and get changed. There is also a rooftop entrance to the hotel up in my nest, but I do not wish to deal with my followers right now, which is why we shall be entering from ground level.)]

Escorting the beautiful matriarch out of her shop, you suggest that the two of you should fly to her apartment so as to arrive there as quickly as possible. Liking the sound of your plan, Helena joins you in taking a short run down the street, before leaping into the air and flying up into the sky above Slaver Alley.

With the regal matriarch elegantly gliding along beside you, the two of you fly off in the direction of the Harpy Nests. Thanks to your ability to fly, it only takes a few minutes before you've arrived at your destination, and, letting Helena take the lead, you follow her as she swoops down and lands in the street beneath her nest. With 'The Golden Feather' hotel just across the street from your landing site, Helena declares, [helena.speech(Let us head inside without delay; I wish to get changed as soon as possible.)]

Escorting the beautiful matriarch out of her shop, you suggest that she could ride on your back so as to arrive at her apartment as quickly as possible. Upon hearing what it is you're suggesting, Helena blushes a little and asks, [helena.speech(You would offer to let me ride upon your back? Are you not concerned that others might think you to be my slave?)]

Telling Helena that you don't care what others think, you turn to one side and present your [pc.legRace]'s body for her to sit upon. Continuing to blush a little, Helena flaps up to perch upon your back in a side-saddle position. After the surprisingly-light matriarch has told you that her apartment is located in the Harpy Nests, you set off at a canter off through the streets of Dominion.

Although she sometimes has to raise her voice a little to be heard over the chattering crowds of people, Helena happily engages you in idle conversation while you carry her towards her apartment, which helps to make your somewhat lengthy journey pass in what seems like just a few moments. Before you know it, you find yourself walking in the shadows cast by the Harpy Nest's huge, rooftop platforms, and as you arrive in the area beneath Helena's nest, the matriarch gets you to halt, before sliding off your back, pointing at a huge building, and declaring, [helena.speech(That's 'The Golden Feather' hotel. We shall be dining in its restaurant this evening, but before that, I need to head up to my apartment and get changed.)]

Escorting the beautiful matriarch out of her shop, you suggest that she could ride on your back so as to arrive at her apartment as quickly as possible. Upon hearing what it is you're suggesting, Helena blushes a little and asks, [helena.speech(You would offer to let me ride upon your back? Are you not concerned that others might think you to be my slave?)]

After the surprisingly-light matriarch has told you that her apartment is located in the Harpy Nests, you set off at a canter off through the streets of Dominion.

Although she sometimes has to raise her voice a little to be heard over the chattering crowds of people, Helena happily engages you in idle conversation while you carry her towards her apartment, which helps to make your somewhat lengthy journey pass in what seems like just a few moments. Before you know it, you find yourself walking in the shadows cast by the Harpy Nest's huge, rooftop platforms, and as you once again arrive in front of 'The Golden Feather' hotel, you stop to let Helena slip off your back and declare, [helena.speech(Let us head inside without delay; I wish to get changed as soon as possible.)]

As Helena starts to lead you towards the hotel's grand entrance, you realise that her apartment must also be in this building. The pretty harpy doorwoman on duty hurries to hold open the door for the two of you, and as she sees that it's none other than Helena herself who's passing her by, she bows down and squeaks, [style.speechFeminine(Good evening, ma'am!)]

Returning the harpy's greeting, Helena strides through the open door and enters the hotel's grand, opulent foyer, before turning to smile at you and say, [helena.speech(My apartment is on the top floor of this hotel. I shall only be a short while, so it would be best for you to wait here for my return. Oh, look, my dear Scarlett is waiting over there, so you can talk with her while you wait!)]

Sure enough, you see Scarlett moodily slouched down on one of the many sofas which are positioned on the far side of the foyer, and as Helena strides over to a nearby elevator and disappears from sight, you decide to head over and say hello to the black-feathered harpy. As you approach, she looks up and #IF(scarlett.getAffectionLevelBasic(pc)==AFFECTION_BASIC_LIKE) says, [scarlett.speech(Hi, [pc.name]. It looks like both of us are having to wait for Helena's return, huh?)] #ELSE mutters, [scarlett.speech(What the fuck do you want, [pc.name]? It's your fault that I'm having to hang around here and wait for Helena instead of finding some harpy slut to fuck...)] #ENDIF

Deciding that it would be best to not risk angering Scarlett, you choose not to engage the raven-harpy in conversation and instead quietly wait upon the sofa for Helena to return. Seeming to be just as happy as you are to sit in silence, Scarlett slouches down on her seat, before lifting her bird-like legs and resting her sharp talons upon the coffee table positioned in front of her. Although you notice a couple of the members of staff pointedly glancing over at Scarlett's rude posturing, none of them dare to approach and tell her to stop, letting you know that they must already be aware of Scarlett's short temper.

Deciding that it would be best to pass the time by engaging in conversation with Scarlett, you ask her how she is and if she visits this hotel often. #IF(scarlett.getAffectionLevelBasic(pc)==AFFECTION_BASIC_LIKE) Although she tries to hide it, the raven-harpy is clearly happy to be getting a chance to talk with you, and after telling you that she's well, she goes on to explain, [scarlett.speech(I never used to visit this place, but since I became Helena's PA, I've been staying in one of the guest bedrooms in her apartment, so I pretty much live here now. I don't know if she's told you yet, but Helena actually owns this entire hotel, and seeing as I'm so close to her, all the hotel staff let me do pretty much anything I want in here.)] #ELSE Although at first she tries to dismiss your questioning with a barrage of her usual foul language, she eventually relents and reluctantly tells you that she's well. Once she starts talking, she can't seem to stop, and quickly goes on to explain, [scarlett.speech(I never used to visit this fucking place, but since I became Helena's PA, I've been staying in one of the guest bedrooms in her apartment, so I pretty much live here now. I don't know if she's told you yet, but Helena actually owns this entire hotel, and seeing as I'm so close to her, all the hotel staff let me do whatever the fuck I want in here.)] #ENDIF

Wanting there to be a romantic atmosphere in Helena's apartment for when you escort her up there after your meal, you ask Scarlett if she could help you set something like that up. Letting out a sigh and slouching even further down on her sofa, the raven-harpy asks, [scarlett.speech(What sort of thing did you have in mind? I doubt just dimming the lights and lighting some candles is going to cut it...)]

Passing the trio of rose bouquets to Scarlett, you explain how you'd like her to scatter the petals leading from the entrance of Helena's apartment into her bedroom. Liking the sound of the dimmed lights and lit candles, you ask the raven-harpy if she could also do that for you. As you're one of the very few people which she actually likes, Scarlett takes the roses from you and agrees to do as you ask, [scarlett.speech(Sure, I could set all of that up for you. Hopefully it'll put Helena in a good mood over the weekend...)]

Flashing you a withering scowl, she starts to tell you to fuck off, before suddenly changing her mind mid-sentence and slyly offering, #IF(scarlett.hasPenis()) [scarlett.speech(Sure, I could set that up for you, but it's going to cost you. Either give a thousand flames, or get on your knees and give me a quick blowjob before Helena returns.)] #ELSE [scarlett.speech(Sure, I could set that up for you, but it's going to cost you. Either give a thousand flames, or get on your knees and quickly eat me out before Helena returns.)] #ENDIF

Flashing you a devious grin, Scarlett asks, [scarlett.speech(So, what's it going to be, cunt? If you want to impress Helena and get to fuck her tight little pussy, you've got to do something for me first.)]
Taking her feet off the coffee table, Scarlett stands up and lets out a big yawn. Wishing you luck with your date, she hurries off to carry out her task, leaving you alone while you wait for Helena.

Not liking the sound of what Scarlett is saying, you flatly tell her that those conditions are not acceptable. Letting out a dismissive huff, the raven-harpy slouches down and says, [scarlett.speech(If you don't fucking like it, then don't fucking bother me about it again!)]

With your refusal clearly having put Scarlett in a foul mood, you decide that it would be best not to pay the raven-harpy any more attention, and instead quietly wait upon the sofa for Helena to return. Although you notice a couple of the members of staff pointedly glancing over at Scarlett's rude posturing, none of them dare to approach and tell her to stop, letting you know that they must already be aware of Scarlett's short temper.

Sitting up on her sofa, the raven-harpy snatches the flames from out of your [pc.hand], before asking, [scarlett.speech(So what exactly do you fucking want me to do? I don't think just dimming the lights and lighting some candles is going to impress Helena...)]

Passing the trio of rose bouquets to Scarlett, you explain how you'd like her to scatter the petals leading from the entrance of Helena's apartment into her bedroom. Liking the sound of the dimmed lights and lit candles, you ask the raven-harpy if she could also do that for you. Having already received her payment, Scarlett snatches the roses from you and agrees to do as you ask, [scarlett.speech(Sure, I'll get that set up. It should put Helena in a good mood over the weekend, so it's good for me as well...)]

Taking her feet off the coffee table, Scarlett stands up and lets out a big yawn. Throwing one last sneer your way, she hurries off to carry out her task, leaving you alone to wait for Helena.

Deciding that sucking Scarlett's cock is a small price to pay in exchange for impressing Helena with a romantic gesture, you quickly move forwards and drop your head down between her legs. Having already gone this far, you see no harm in doing as Scarlett asks, and #IF(scarlett.hasPenis()) lean in to her groin to lick the excess cum and saliva off her cock. #ELSE lean in to her groin to lick the excess fluids and saliva off her [scarlett.labia+]. #ENDIF Triumphantly chuckling to herself as you quickly finish cleaning her up, Scarlett leans back on the sofa and says, [scarlett.speech(Ok, bitch, that's enough. You can sit back down now. Oh, and you'd better wipe your face before Helena sees you...)]

Doing as the raven-harpy suggests, you sit back down on the sofa opposite hers, before grabbing a nearby tissue and hurriedly wiping the sexual fluids from off of your face. As you finish cleaning yourself up, Scarlett sits up on her sofa and asks, [scarlett.speech(So what exactly do you want me to do? I don't think just dimming the lights and lighting some candles is going to impress Helena...)]

Passing the trio of rose bouquets to Scarlett, you explain how you'd like her to scatter the petals leading from the entrance of Helena's apartment into her bedroom. Liking the sound of the dimmed lights and lit candles, you ask the raven-harpy if she could also do that for you. Having already received her 'payment' from you, Scarlett snatches the roses and agrees to do as you ask, [scarlett.speech(Sure, I'll get that set up. It should put Helena in a good mood over the weekend, so it's good for me as well...)]

Taking her feet off the coffee table, Scarlett stands up and lets out a big yawn. Throwing one last triumphant smirk your way, she hurries off to carry out her task, leaving you alone to wait for Helena.

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_helenaDateRomanticSetup)) After another few minutes spent waiting on the sofa, you see the elevator doors on the other side of the foyer slide open, and from within the regal figure of Helena emerges. #ELSE After another fifteen minutes spent in Scarlett's company, you see the elevator doors on the other side of the foyer slide open, and from within the regal figure of Helena emerges. #ENDIF #IF(helena.isSlutty()) Matching the colour of her painted nails and lipstick, she's shamelessly wearing a bright pink, plunge-neck clubbing dress, which leaves most of her breasts and stomach completely exposed. Biting her lip and beckoning you over to her with one of her white wings, she does a little spin on the spot and sluttily teases, [helena.speech(I chose to wear this as I thought it'd be the easiest to slip out of once we get up to my bedroom later... Before that, however, should we proceed to dinner?)] #ELSE Matching the colour of her flawless feathers, she's wearing an elegant white evening gown, which, along with her diamond necklace and delicate golden tiara, accentuates her beauty to the point where the hotel's staff members are left unable to do anything but stare at her in awe. Moving to meet her as she gracefully strides across the room, you offer the harpy a sincere compliment on her appearance, which causes her blush a little and reply, [helena.speech(I'm pleased to hear that you like my choice of dress. Now, shall we proceed to dinner?)] #ENDIF

#IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_helenaDateRomanticSetup)) After you've replied in the positive, Helena tells Scarlett that her presence will not be needed after all, and after the raven-harpy has moodily stomped off, she #ELSE Clearly not requiring Scarlett's presence, Helena makes no mention of the fact that the raven-harpy is missing, and as soon as you've replied to her previous question in the positive, she #ENDIF #IF(helena.isSlutty()) leans in close to lewdly whisper to you, [helena.speech(By the way, [pc.name], I was in such a hurry that I forgot to put on any underwear... I hope you won't be distracted by that thought...)] #ELSE steps up close beside you and pointedly says, [helena.speech(The restaurant is through the doors over there, [pc.name].)] #ENDIF

Escorting the beautiful matriarch across the room and into the extravagantly-furnished restaurant, you're immediately approached by a smartly-dressed harpy waitress, who politely and professionally leads you over to what she describes as the best table in the restaurant. Sure enough, as you and Helena sit down opposite to one another, you find that the position of your table near to the corner of the room grants you a decent level of privacy while also not feeling as though you've been placed somewhere out of sight.

After giving each of you a menu and describing the day's specials, the waitress asks what you'd like to drink. Knowing exactly what it is she wants, Helena asks for the most expensive bottle of wine on the list, before looking into your eyes and asking, [helena.speech(You'll share this bottle with me, won't you, [pc.name]?)]

Not wanting to let Helena down, you tell the waitress that you'll be sharing the bottle of wine with her. Having taken your drink orders, the harpy quickly darts off to fetch the bottle of wine, leaving Helena to smugly state, #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_helenaDateFirstDateComplete)) [helena.speech(As I own this hotel, there'll be no charge for anything on the menu, so just like the last time, you won't have the opportunity to impress me by offering to pay for the meal.)] #ELSE [helena.speech(I don't think I've mentioned it to you yet, but I actually own this entire hotel. There'll be no charge for anything on the menu, so I'm afraid that you don't have the opportunity to impress me by offering to pay for the meal.)] #ENDIF

At that moment, the harpy waitress returns with the bottle of wine, and after opening it and pouring a small amount in Helena's glass for her to taste, she proceeds to pour each of you a full glass. Having already looked over the menu, you're able to then give the waitress your order, and after Helena has also chosen what she'd like for her meal, the waitress bows and darts off, leaving the two of you alone at last. As you take a drink from your wine glass, Helena smiles at you and strikes up a conversation...

Not wanting to drink any alcohol, you tell the waitress that you'd just like some water. Having taken your orders, the harpy quickly darts off to fetch your drinks, leaving Helena to pout and state, #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_helenaDateFirstDateComplete)) [helena.speech(I was hoping you'd share the wine with me, [pc.name]... Anyway, I just wanted to remind you that as I own this hotel, there'll be no charge for anything on the menu, so you won't have the opportunity to impress me by offering to pay for the meal.)] #ELSE [helena.speech(I was hoping you'd share the wine with me, [pc.name]... Anyway, I don't think I've mentioned it to you yet, but I actually own this entire hotel. There'll be no charge for anything on the menu, so I'm afraid that you don't have the opportunity to impress me by offering to pay for the meal.)] #ENDIF

At that moment, the harpy waitress returns with both your glass of water and Helena's chosen bottle of wine. After placing your drink down before you, she proceeds to open the bottle and pour a small amount in Helena's glass for her to taste. Expressing her approval, Helena waits for the waitress to pour her a full glass before telling her what she'd like to order for her meal. Having already looked over the menu, you're also able to give the waitress your order, and after you've done so, the harpy bows and darts off, leaving you and Helena alone at last. As you take a drink from your glass of water, Helena smiles at you and strikes up a conversation...

Not liking the sound of sharing a bottle of wine with Helena, you tell the waitress that you'd like a beer instead. Having taken your orders, the harpy quickly darts off to fetch your drinks, leaving Helena to pout and state, #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_helenaDateFirstDateComplete)) [helena.speech(I was hoping you'd share the wine with me, [pc.name]... Anyway, I just wanted to remind you that as I own this hotel, there'll be no charge for anything on the menu, so you won't have the opportunity to impress me by offering to pay for the meal.)] #ELSE [helena.speech(I was hoping you'd share the wine with me, [pc.name]... Anyway, I don't think I've mentioned it to you yet, but I actually own this entire hotel. There'll be no charge for anything on the menu, so I'm afraid that you don't have the opportunity to impress me by offering to pay for the meal.)] #ENDIF

At that moment, the harpy waitress returns with both your beer and Helena's chosen bottle of wine. After placing your drink down before you, she proceeds to open the wine bottle and pour a small amount in Helena's glass for her to taste. Expressing her approval, Helena waits for the waitress to pour her a full glass before telling her what she'd like to order for her meal. Having already looked over the menu, you're also able to give the waitress your order, and after you've done so, the harpy bows and darts off, leaving you and Helena alone at last. As you take a drink of beer, Helena smiles at you and strikes up a conversation...

Not liking the sound of sharing a bottle of wine with Helena, you tell the waitress that you'd like a glass of whiskey instead. Having taken your orders, the harpy quickly darts off to fetch your drinks, leaving Helena to pout and state, #IF(game.getDialogueFlags().hasFlag(FLAG_helenaDateFirstDateComplete)) [helena.speech(I was hoping you'd share the wine with me, [pc.name]... Anyway, I just wanted to remind you that as I own this hotel, there'll be no charge for anything on the menu, so you won't have the opportunity to impress me by offering to pay for the meal.)] #ELSE [helena.speech(I was hoping you'd share the wine with me, [pc.name]... Anyway, I don't think I've mentioned it to you yet, but I actually own this entire hotel. There'll be no charge for anything on the menu, so I'm afraid that you don't have the opportunity to impress me by offering to pay for the meal.)] #ENDIF

At that moment, the harpy waitress returns with both your whiskey and Helena's chosen bottle of wine. After placing your drink down before you, she proceeds to open the wine bottle and pour a small amount in Helena's glass for her to taste. Expressing her approval, Helena waits for the waitress to pour her a full glass before telling her what she'd like to order for her meal. Having already looked over the menu, you're also able to give the waitress your order, and after you've done so, the harpy bows and darts off, leaving you and Helena alone at last. As you take a drink of whiskey, Helena smiles at you and strikes up a conversation...

[helena.speech(You weren't around at the time, [pc.name], or else I might have asked for your assistance in the matter, but the other day there was a group of protesters marching through Slaver Alley, shouting for slavery to be abolished,)] the matriarch reveals, the tone of her voice clearly conveying the fact that she disapproves of such protests. Taking another sip of her wine, she leans back in her chair and states, [helena.speech(That rabble kicked up such a fuss that I had to personally fly over to the Enforcer headquarters and demand they come and break it up. Needless to say, the sergeant on duty rushed to my aid, and within the hour all of the protesters had been arrested. A few of them actually ended up getting enslaved themselves as a punishment for assaulting the Enforcers who were trying to arrest them!)]

Clearly finding this fact amusing, Helena lets out a soft laugh, before asking, [helena.speech(What's your view on slavery, [pc.name]?)]

[helena.speech(Some more protesters showed up in Slaver Alley the other day, shouting all kinds of nonsense about how slavery should be abolished,)] Helena says, before taking another sip of her wine and continuing, [helena.speech(Of course, I had the Enforcers come and arrest them, but I get the feeling that sooner or later those of them who weren't enslaved themselves will be back to start another protest. Honestly, I don't see why the Enforcers don't just enslave them all!)]

Letting out a weary sigh, Helena takes yet another sip of wine and asks, [helena.speech(Remind me, [pc.name], what do you think of slavery?)]

Finding yourself approving of how Helena handled the protesters, you tell her that you believe slavery to be perfectly natural. Making the point that there are hierarchies everywhere you look in nature, you say that slaves fit into their rightful place at the very bottom of society. What's more, you argue that it's actually a blessing for most slaves to be given the chance to contribute in some way to society, for without slavery, criminals would have to be kept as prisoners at great expense to law-abiding tax payers.

Delighted to hear that your views line up with hers, Helena can't help but let a big smile cross her face, and as you finish giving your opinion, she continues to expand upon the points which you've laid out. In this manner, the two of you continue your discussion on how slavery is of great benefit to society, and before you know it, almost twenty minutes have passed.

Although you know that Helena won't agree with what you're saying, you think it best to give her your honest opinion on the matter of slavery. Telling her that you disapprove of it from a moral standpoint, you reluctantly concede the fact that it seems like a necessity in Dominion's society.
